participant_abstract.sent: Along with the User Interface Designer, I presented our physical prototype models of three remote controls.
The first: a fruit-shaped, yellow thing with blue buttons, black microphone, and the company slogan was proudly displayed on the back.
Next: a red ball with microphone and slogans, with small black buttons hidden on the underside.
We did some quick budget revisions to put the item under our goal, and then had our marketing expert evaluate the product's suitability to enter the market.

participant_decisions.sent: We fixed the budget, by noticing an accounting error.
We concluded that our product could be satisfactorily evaluated.
We decided to launch our product onto the market.

participant_problems.sent: We were in some disagreement over the meaning of "double-curved" shape, but ultimately decided that we had made an error in accounting.
We evaluated our product well, and chose to put it on the market.
